title: Tassel
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: White linen tassel with two separated balls forming the base. These are braided over with linen yarns worked in groups of yarns for a basket-weave effect. Connecting the the upper and lower balls as well as hanging from them are tiny braided balls.

tombstone.epitaph:
Tassel.
Medium: linen
Technique: braided and knotted. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-51-52.
